name: The Hundredt Floor
description:
Hello everyone.

This game is still in alpha and being worked on a lot and Im hoping that I will get far into it. 

What is this game about?

The game is about the player and their sister getting stuck inside of a VRMMO that if you die in you also die in real life (definitely not based on a certain anime)

Your goal is to get to the 100th floor and get out of the game alive.

So get your sword ready and go in the game!

Im planning to add a lot of features to the game like getting jobs at towns, crafting, more floors, dungeons, bosses and other stuff.

The game has a party system with npcs, combat, a slightly annoying inventory system, a housing system and a points system.

Join us over at my discord so we can talk about the game... If you want to!

https://discord.gg/ZEUNWZZhAS

I also post previews of the new versions there. Im working on 0.0.3 right now though so a new preview is gonna come soon
